events.name: Rest Day
events.description:
Rest day, no workout.
(Ref: FTP 314 W OUTDOOR)

events.name: High-Intensity Intervals (INDOOR)
events.description:
Warmup, 5x30s sprints, Z2 recovery, cooldown. Focus on power output.
(Ref: FTP 314 W INDOOR)

events.name: Recovery Spin (INDOOR)
events.description:
Easy spin, low intensity, focus on recovery.
(Ref: FTP 314 W INDOOR)

events.name: Tempo/Threshold Intervals (INDOOR)
events.description:
Low cadence work, 3x10min at threshold, Z2 recovery.
(Ref: FTP 314 W INDOOR)

events.name: Recovery Spin (INDOOR)
events.description:
Easy spin, low intensity, focus on recovery.
(Ref: FTP 314 W INDOOR)

events.name: Long Endurance Ride (OUTDOOR)
events.description:
Z2 ride, focus on endurance, hydration and fueling for 2-3 hours.
(Ref: FTP 324 W OUTDOOR)

events.name: Threshold/SS/Tempo Focus (OUTDOOR)
events.description:
Focus on threshold and sweet spot efforts, 90 min ride.
(Ref: FTP 324 W OUTDOOR)
